channel.title: Newsletter on One-Stop Shop For Omnichannel Contact Centers

item.title: Discord TTS Case Study;Chinese Support for Discord Bot;NearMe Push Messages
item.description: In this edition: [Product] Text-to-Speech Discord Bot Case Study [Product] SeaVoice Discord Bot Supports Chinese [Highlight] Capture Users After They Leave Webchats with Near Me Messaging Text-to-Speech Discord Bot Case Study Our SeaVoice Discord bot has now been added to nearly 800 servers, and is used daily to provide STT and TTS to Discord users.

item.title: Twilio/Seasalt.ai go to APJ; UnTechCon on Discord; Auto Dialer
item.description: In this edition: [News] Seasalt.ai and Twilio Release SeaX to APJ [Conference] UnTechCon Transcribes Large Discord Audio Channels with SeaVoice [Product] SeaX Highlight â€“ Auto Dialer Seasalt.
